title: Vicious Vikings And Measly Middle Ages
description: This title presents the history with twice the nasty bits! "The Measly Middle Ages" tells you what life was really like in days of old when knights were bold, women wore tall pointy hats and the peasants were revolting. "The Vicious Vikings" is packed with frightening facts about these vile invaders - and their savage Saxon enemies - from cruel kings and vengeful Viking warriors to the suffering slaves, the thralls. Read on for curious quizzes, rotten recipes, gruesome games and terrible tests ...for your teacher! History has never been so horrible.
author: Terry Deary
